title: First International Trip: Exploring Taiwan
content:
# First International Trip: Exploring Taiwan

My first international travel experience with my girlfriend took us to Taiwan. We explored famous tourist spots in Taipei, indulged in local cuisine and street food delights.

## Day 1: DIY Adventure

Our first day was a DIY adventure, exploring the city on our own. We visited:

- **Taipei 101** - The iconic skyscraper with breathtaking views
- **Ximending** - The vibrant shopping district
- **Night Markets** - Sampling local street food

## Day 2-3: Guided Tours

The second and third days were guided tours booked through Klook, giving us the perfect mix of spontaneity and convenience.

### Jiufen Old Street

The famous mountain town that inspired Spirited Away. The narrow alleyways filled with red lanterns created a magical atmosphere.

### Shifen Waterfall

Often called the "Little Niagara of Taiwan," this 20-meter waterfall was absolutely stunning.

## Food Highlights

- Beef noodle soup
- Bubble tea from the original inventors
- Xiao long bao (soup dumplings)
- Mango shaved ice

> Taiwan exceeded all our expectations. The blend of modern city life, traditional culture, and incredible food made it the perfect first international trip.

Can't wait to explore more of Asia!
